trans-unit.source: Defines an area that receives and displays ink strokes.
trans-unit.target: Definerer et område som mottar og viser linjer.

trans-unit.source: An InkCanvas is an element that can be used to receive and display ink input.
trans-unit.target: En InkCanvas er et element som kan brukes til å motta og vise farge inndata.

trans-unit.source: This is commonly done through the use of a stylus, which interacts with a digitizer to produce ink strokes using a stylus or a mouse.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer vanligvis ved å bruke en stylus som kommuniserer med en digitaliseringsenhet til å produsere linjer å bruke en stylus eller musen.

trans-unit.source: The created strokes are represented as <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> objects, and can be manipulated either programmatically or based on user input.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet strøkene representeres som <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>objekter, og kan ikke endres enten programmatisk eller basert på brukerinndata.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The InkCanvas enables users to modify or delete an existing <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: InkCanvas lar brukere endre eller slette en eksisterende <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The InkCanvas can be bound to a data source.
trans-unit.target: InkCanvas kan være bundet til en datakilde.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> property to: a base-64, encoded string that contains ink data in Ink Serialized format (ISF); or even to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> property of another InkCanvas.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel binde den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>egenskapen: en base&64;-, kodet streng som inneholder farge dataene i farge serialisert format (ISF); eller engang til den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>-egenskapen til en annen InkCanvas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also bind properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>, to other data sources.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også binde egenskaper som <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>, til andre datakilder.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the InkCanvas class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av klassen InkCanvas.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveEditingMode property indicates the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ActiveEditingMode angir det gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>

trans-unit.target: Sett som <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the tablet pen is used in an inverted position, ActiveEditingMode has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.
trans-unit.target: Når tavlepennen brukes i en omvendt posisjon, har ActiveEditingMode en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, its value is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.
trans-unit.target: Ellers er verdien <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tegneattributter som er brukt i nye linjer foretas i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property will affect only new strokes that are made after this property is set.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen påvirker bare nye strøk som utføres etter at denne egenskapen er angitt.

trans-unit.source: To apply new drawing attributes to already-created <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> objects, access them individually using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruke nye tegneattributter allerede opprettet <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>objekter, bruker ark med den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the stylus point description for an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir stylus punkt beskrivelse for en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> stores only the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> properties for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> belonging to a stroke.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>lagrer bare den <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, og <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>Egenskaper for hver <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>som hører til en strek.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: You can use the DefaultStylusPointDescription property to store additional information about points comprising the strokes on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen DefaultStylusPointDescription til å lagre tilleggsinformasjon om punkt som består av strøkene <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property will affect only new strokes that are made after the property is set.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen påvirker bare nye strøk som utføres når egenskapen er angitt.

trans-unit.source: The stylus point description for an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Stylus punkt beskrivelse for en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the renderer that dynamically draws ink on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir gjengiveren som dynamisk tegner farge på den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can set the DynamicRenderer property to a custom <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> if you want to customize the ink.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi DynamicRenderer-egenskapen til en egendefinert <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>Hvis du vil tilpasse farge.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DynamicRenderer is a member of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusPlugIns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For DynamicRenderer er medlem av den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusPlugIns%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusPlugIns%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the DynamicRenderer, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> removes the old <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugInCollection> and adds the new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir DynamicRenderer, den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>Fjerner gamle <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>fra den <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugInCollection>og legger til den nye <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>til slutten av samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugInCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: This may change the behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan endre virkemåten for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: The renderer that dynamically draws ink on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjengiveren som dynamisk tegner blekk på den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user editing mode used by an active pointing device.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir brukeren redigeringsmodus brukes av en aktiv peker enhet.

trans-unit.source: The default EditingMode is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.
trans-unit.target: Standard EditingMode er <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>

trans-unit.source: Changing the EditingMode clears any existing selections.
trans-unit.target: Endring av EditingMode tømmes eksisterende valg.

trans-unit.source: The EditingMode specifies the mode of the pointing device as it interacts with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: EditingMode angir modus peker enhet som den samhandler med <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> is used by some digitizers when the "eraser end" of the stylus contacts the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A>brukes av noen digitaliseringsenheter når "Viskelær nederst" pekepennen kontakter digitaliseringsenhet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A>

trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir hvilken del av valg adorner krysser eller omgir angitt punkt.

trans-unit.source: Use the HitTestSelection method to determine whether the point is within a stroke selection's bounds or on one of the eight handles.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HitTestSelection-metoden til å finne ut om punktet er i en strek utvalget område eller på én av åtte håndtakene.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when performing drag and drop operations.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når utfører dra og slipp operasjoner.

trans-unit.target: Tilgjengelige størrelsen som dette elementet kan gi til underordnede elementer.

trans-unit.target: Uendelig kan angis som en verdi som viser at elementet skal størrelsen til hvilket innhold er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på at dette elementet bestemmer den må ved oppsett, basert på beregningene av underordnet element størrelse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value which indicates whether the user is enabled to move selected ink strokes and/or elements on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som indikerer om brukeren er konfigurert til å flytte valgte linjer og/eller elementer på den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, an adorner border is drawn around ink strokes and/or elements when they are selected.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `true`, en adorner kantlinje vises rundt linjer og/eller elementer når de er valgt.

trans-unit.source: This border enables the user to move the selected objects.
trans-unit.target: Denne kantlinjen lar brukeren å flytte de merkede objektene.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ResizeEnabled%2A> is `true`, the adorner enables the user to resize the strokes and/or elements as well.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ResizeEnabled%2A>er `true`, adorner lar brukeren å endre størrelsen på streker og/eller elementer samt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ResizeEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false` while one or more ink strokes and/or elements are selected, the adorner border will be automatically removed from the selected objects.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `false` når én eller flere linjer og/eller elementer er valgt, adorner kantlinjen automatisk fjernet fra de merkede objektene.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a user can move strokes and/or elements on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en bruker kan flytte streker og/eller elementer på den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: En programmatisk tillegging av streker på den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>samlingen kan ikke kalle metoden OnStrokeCollected.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> can support Clipboard data in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] format, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-isf-md.md)], and text format.

trans-unit.target: Setter inn innholdet på utklippstavlen til den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref> på et gitt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> can support Clipboard data in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] format, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-isf-md.md)], and text format.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *InkCanvasClipboardFormats* An array of enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML egenskapen Element Bruk ``` ``` ## XAML verdier *InkCanvasClipboardFormats* en matrise av nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: Specifying an array in XAML requires `x:Array` usage.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av en matrise i XAML krever `x:Array` bruk.

trans-unit.source: Specifying an enumeration value as an element that declares an array member requires `x:Static` usage.
trans-unit.target: Angir en nummereringsverdi som et element som deklarerer et medlem i matrisen krever `x:Static` bruk.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [x:Array Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [x:Static Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [x: matrise Markup utvidelsen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [x: statiske Markup filtypen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A collection of enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: En samling av nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasClipboardFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasClipboardFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the user can resize selected ink strokes and/or elements on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som angir om brukeren kan endre størrelse på valgte linjer og/eller elementer på den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, an adorner border is drawn around ink strokes and/or elements when they are selected.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `true`, en adorner kantlinje vises rundt linjer og/eller elementer når de er valgt.

trans-unit.source: This border enables the user to resize the selected objects.
trans-unit.target: Denne kantlinjen lar brukeren å endre størrelsen på de merkede objektene.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.MoveEnabled%2A> is `true`, the adorner enables the user to move the strokes and/or elements as well.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.MoveEnabled%2A>er `true`, adorner lar brukeren flytter streker og/eller elementer samt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.MoveEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false` while one or more ink strokes and/or elements are selected, the adorner border is automatically removed from the selected objects.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `false` når én eller flere linjer og/eller elementer er valgt, adorner kantlinjen automatisk fjernet fra de merkede objektene.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a user can resize strokes and/or elements on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en bruker kan endre størrelse på streker og/eller elementer på den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når et sett med linjer og/eller elementer som er valgt, og brukes av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: If, instead, you must handle a request that select a set of ink strokes and/or elements before the selection is applied, add an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du i stedet må du behandle en forespørsel som velge et sett med linjer og/eller elementer før utvalget brukes, legger du til en hendelsesbehandling til den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanging>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanging>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new set of ink strokes and/or elements is being selected.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når et nytt sett med linjer og/eller elementer velges.

trans-unit.source: The SelectionChanging event is raised when strokes and/or elements are selected by the user - but before the change is applied.
trans-unit.target: SelectionChanging denne hendelsen oppstår når streker og/eller elementer er valgt av bruker -, men før endringen trer i kraft.

trans-unit.source: The SelectionChanging event is processed when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventHandler> receives an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: SelectionChanging hendelsen behandles når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventHandler>mottar en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventArgs>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventHandler>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventArgs>inneholder metoder for å få tilgang til <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>og <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>objekter når de er valgt av brukeren.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement></xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: After the change is applied, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Etter at endringen er brukt, den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SelectionChanging event does not occur when the selected strokes are deleted or when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ActiveEditingMode%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For SelectionChanging hendelsen ikke oppstår når de valgte strøkene er slettet, eller når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ActiveEditingMode%2A>egenskapsendringer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ActiveEditingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the user moves a selection of strokes and/or elements.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren flytter en rekke streker og/eller elementer.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after a selection of strokes and/or elements is moved, but before the stroke or element data is updated to record its new position.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når et utvalg av streker og/eller elementer er flyttet, men dataene oppdateres før strek eller element for å registrere den nye posisjonen.

trans-unit.source: Add an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoving> event.
trans-unit.target: Legg til en hendelsesbehandling til den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoving>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoving>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before selected strokes and elements are moved.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer før valgte streker og elementer er flyttet.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after the user requests that a selection of strokes and/or elements be moved, but before the change is applied.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren ber om at et utvalg av streker og/eller elementer flyttes, men før endringen trer i kraft.

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives an argument of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs> with two properties: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen mottar et argument av typen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs>med to egenskaper: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> defines the boundaries of the selection before the move and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A> defines the boundaries of the selection after the move.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>definerer grensene for utvalget før flyttingen og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>definerer grensene for utvalget etter flyttingen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the change is applied, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoved> event will occur.
trans-unit.target: Etter at endringen er brukt, den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoved>hendelsen skjer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoved>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a selection of strokes and/or elements has been resized by the user.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en rekke streker og/eller elementer er endret av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised after a selection of strokes and/or elements is resized.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når et utvalg av streker og/eller elementer endres.

trans-unit.source: If, instead, you must handle a request to resize a selection before the strokes and/or elements are resized, add an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResizing> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du i stedet må du behandle en forespørsel om å endre størrelsen på et utvalg før streker og/eller elementer skaleres, legger du til en hendelsesbehandling til den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResizing>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResizing>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before selected strokes and elements are resized.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer før valgte streker og elementer skaleres.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after the user requests that a selection of strokes and/or elements be resized, but before the change is applied.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren ber om en rekke streker og/eller elementer endres, men før endringen trer i kraft.

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives an argument of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs> that contains two properties: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen mottar et argument av typen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs>som inneholder to egenskaper: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> defines the boundaries of the selection before the resizing operation and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A> defines the boundaries of the selection after the resizing operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>definerer grensene for utvalget før operasjonen endre størrelse på og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>definerer grensene for utvalget etter endring av størrelse operasjonen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the strokes and/or elements are updated with the new size, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResized> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Når streker og/eller elementer er oppdatert med den nye størrelsen, i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResized>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResized>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a stroke drawn by the user is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes*> property.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en strek tegnes av brukeren legges til i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when a user completes a stroke using a pointing device.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når en bruker er en strek ved hjelp av en peker enhet.

trans-unit.source: For example, a user might raise a stylus from a digitizer after making a motion, thereby completing a stroke.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan en bruker øke stylus fra en digitaliseringsenhet etter at en bevegelsesregistrerings dermed fullføring av en strek.

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives an argument of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasStrokeCollectedEventArgs>, which references the completed stroke.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen mottar et argument av typen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasStrokeCollectedEventArgs>, som refererer til den fullstendige streken.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasStrokeCollectedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The stroke is also added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: Streken også legges til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The programmatic addition of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> object to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> collection does not raise this event.
trans-unit.target: Programmatisk tillegging av et <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>objekt i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>samlingen ikke heve denne hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: Handle this event when you want to check whether a stroke should be erased.
trans-unit.target: Behandle denne hendelsen når du vil kontrollere om en strek skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` if you want to prevent the stroke from being erased.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true` Hvis du vil hindre at streken blir slettet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether to override standard <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref> cursor functionality to support a custom cursor.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som angir om å overstyre standard <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref> markøren funksjonaliteten for å støtte en egendefinert markør.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> will change the cursor style to reflect the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> while the cursor is within the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>Endrer Markørstil for å gjenspeile den gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>mens markøren er utenfor grensene for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: If this behavior is not wanted, for example, when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> uses a custom cursor, set this property to `true`, and the cursor will not change with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dette ikke er ville, for eksempel når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>bruker en egendefinert pekeren, og angi denne egenskapen `true`, og markøren endres ikke med <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"></xref> is using a custom cursor; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas"> </xref> bruker en egendefinert markør; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
